body_html: It should be possible to have a ./configure --update-git or something that does only the part that of configure that needs to be redone. The point of this is so that git_version is correct in compiled binaries, which is important for support and bug fixing, but I agree that having to rebuild everything just to update the file that bazel uses to acquire git_version is onerous.

body: It should be possible to have a ./configure --update-git or something that does only the part that of configure that needs to be redone. The point of this is so that __git_version__ is correct in compiled binaries, which is important for support and bug fixing, but I agree that having to rebuild everything just to update the file that bazel uses to acquire __git_version__ is onerous.
